Uses of Package
com.esri.mo2.map.img

Packages that use com.esri.mo2.map.img
com.esri.mo2.client.aims Implementation of the Content API for ArcIMS 4 client services. 
com.esri.mo2.ext.img Classes collection to support read/write for different image formats. 
com.esri.mo2.map.img Classes that are used for communicating with ESRI ArcIMS components for all current versions. 
com.esri.mo2.mil.img.rpf Provides helpful classes for handling RPF and NITF structures in JAI specific manner. 
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.img used by com.esri.mo2.client.aims
BaseImageLayerSource
          Deprecated. - the class has been deprecated, see Content API.
ImageLayerSource
          Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.img used by com.esri.mo2.ext.img
ImageReader
          This interface defines an access to image readers that implemented in image PlugIns.
ImageWriter
          Writes an image to an output stream.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.img used by com.esri.mo2.map.img
Cache
          An Image Cache holds (in memory) copies of Image data for a particular ImageServer.
Image
          A simple geo-referenced image.
ImageCatalog
          An ImageCatalog is a kind of ImageClass that obtains imagery from one or more ImageFiles that are defined within some container object that is implementation-dependent.
ImageClass
          An ImageClass is a kind of MapDataset that obtains Image data from its datasource when it is searched.
ImageException
          A generic Exception that is thrown within the com.esri.mo2.map.img package.
ImageLayer
          An ImageLayer is a visual representation of a particular ImageClass.
ImageLayerSource
          Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.
ImageServer
          Provides support for an ImageServerLayer by managing retrieval of map images from ArcIMS ImageServer.
ImageServerLayer
          An ImageServerLayer is a visual representation of one of the supported ImageServers.
MissingSubLayersException
          Thrown by BaseImageLayerSource.applyDefaultExtent method if no subLayers have been defined.
ServerImage
          A simple geo-referenced image.
SubLayerSnapshot
          Contains status information about the subLayers of an ImageServerLayer.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.img used by com.esri.mo2.mil.img.rpf
ImageReader
          This interface defines an access to image readers that implemented in image PlugIns.
